text: أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ أَوۡ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَمَن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
translation: 40. Atu nabiyow ayti-maleela (cakki maabbak Yalli ayti как alfe mara kinnuk) taysabbem duddaa? Hinnay inti-maleelaa (cakki mabuluk Yalli inti kak alfeh yan mara kinnuk) kee baxxaqqa iyye makkootiyyih addat yan mara tirri haytam duddaa?ken tirto koo matan cagalah koo tanim diini ken guddussaamâ kal.
